Comment: The gaskets arrived but wrong material specification, we ordered Viton but received EPDG instead. Can you check the order form on your side and arrange replacement urgent? Our installation scheduled for Thursday cannot delay.

The gasket material you supplied is not meeting the temperature spec we discussed during our meeting last month. Already had one failure during pressure testing and need immediate replacement plus confirmation that new batch can handle 180 degrees continuous operation. Please respond today as production line is waiting.

Just want to highlight that your technical team was very helpful in recommending the alternative gasket material when the original spec wasn't suitable for our chemical application. However the invoice amount doesn't match the revised quotation you sent last Friday, can you check and reissue?

The gaskets you supplied last month are working fine but now we need the same spec in different sizes. Can you confirm lead time if we place order by end of this week? Also your sales guy never reply my WhatsApp from Tuesday.
Your QC team very thorough, caught the bolt hole misalignment before we even installed. Saved us maybe 2 days of rework at site. Hope can maintain this checking standard for future orders.

The galvanised pipes you delivered last week confirm to spec and quality is good, but your delivery driver never call before coming so our site supervisor wasn't there to receive. Can your team coordinate better next time because we cannot leave materials outside overnight, got theft issue at our Woodlands site.

Just want to say thanks for the fast response on the technical query yesterday. Saved us a lot of time because the installation team was already on site waiting for clarification. This kind of support really helps when we're under pressure to meet deadlines.

The gaskets you supplied last month are performing very well in our steam line, no leaks so far. But the invoice amount different from quotation, can you check and send revised invoice? Our accounts department holding payment until this is sorted out.

The galvanized coating on the recent batch looks uneven compared to what we normally get from you all. Can send someone to inspect before we accept delivery or not? Our QC very particular about surface finish for this client's project.

Your team promised delivery by Friday morning but now your coordinator say maybe Monday. This kind of last minute change very troublesome for us because we already schedule the installation crew. Can you confirm the actual date so I can inform my site supervisor?

The motor starter you delivered yesterday is working fine but your technician left without explaining the maintenance schedule. Can someone call me back to go through the proper procedures? Also still waiting for the warranty certificate you promised to email.

The gasket material you sent last batch seem to degrade faster than before, our maintenance team feedback after 3 months already need replace but normally can last 6 months. Not sure if supplier change the rubber compound or what. Can check your side got any change in specs?

Your sales guy Marcus very helpful, respond fast to my questions about the flange specifications. But the delivery came 2 days late, my contractor complain already because they schedule the workers. Next time can coordinate better with logistics?

The gaskets arrived on time but some of the packing boxes were damaged during transport, luckily the items inside still okay. Your logistics team very responsive when I called to report. Next time maybe can use stronger cartons for heavy items.

The galvanized coating thickness varies too much across the batch, some pieces only 40 microns when spec is 85 minimum. Our QA reject about 30% already. Can you check your process or send replacement?

Your QC team very helpful lah, they spot the gasket mismatch before we install already. But the replacement parts take 5 days to arrive, quite long sia. Next time can keep some common items in local stock or not?

Your quotation came in higher than competitor but we still chose you because past experience with your technical support team very good. Hope this batch of ductile iron fittings can maintain same quality standard like before.

Your team responded quite fast when we had the urgent request for the ball valves last week, appreciated that. However the invoice amount doesn't match what your sales guy quoted over the phone, got about $340 difference. Can you check and send revised invoice?

Your sales guy respond very fast to our RFQ but the delivery date keep pushing back two times already. First say end of March, then mid-April, now saying early May. Our contractor getting impatient, hope can confirm properly this time.

The galvanized coating on the last batch looks uneven, some sections thicker than others. Our QC inspector flagged it during receiving inspection. Can your factory check their process and send replacement if needed?

Your technician came down yesterday to help troubleshoot the valve leaking issue, very professional and patient to explain everything to our maintenance team. But the replacement gasket he recommend is quite expensive compared to what we normally use, can consider give us better pricing for repeat orders or not?

The gaskets you supplied last week working very well, no leakage issues at all. But delivery was 3 days late from what we agreed, caused some delay on our installation schedule. Next time please try to keep to the promised date, otherwise quality wise we are happy to continue ordering from you.

The delivery came two days earlier than promised which is good, but the packaging was quite poor lah - one corner of the crate already damage. Product inside seems okay after we check, but next time please use better wrapping material especially for this type of equipment.

The stainless steel fittings arrived on time but we noticed some surface scratches on about 15% of them. Not sure if this happened during packing or transport. Can you check with your QC team and advise if replacements possible?

The quotation you sent yesterday shows DN100 butterfly valve but our piping layout is all DN150. Can you revise and resend by end of today? Also the lead time 8 weeks is quite long, can push supplier to expedite or not?

The gaskets arrived on time but wrong thickness lah, we ordered 3mm but received 5mm. Now have to wait another week for replacement, our installation schedule all delayed. Please double check the packing list next time before dispatch.

The welding on the support brackets is really top quality, your welder did excellent job. But the delivery was supposed to be last Friday and now already Wednesday still nothing. Can you check with logistics what happen to our shipment?

The technician you sent yesterday was very helpful and professional, fixed the leaking valve in 20 minutes. However I'm still waiting for the invoice he said you'll email same day, need it urgently for our accounts closing this Friday.

Just want to say your technical team very helpful this time, they spend almost 2 hours with our engineer to troubleshoot the actuator problem on site. Really appreciate the support, this kind of service hard to find nowadays.

The galvanized pipes we received last Tuesday have some rust marks already showing on about 20% of the batch. Our QC team quite concerned because this for a hospital project with strict specs. Can you arrange replacement or at least send someone down to inspect and advise?

Your team responded very fast when we had the pressure gauge emergency on Tuesday, appreciate that. But the replacement unit came without calibration cert, now we have to chase again which defeats the purpose of express delivery.
Your team very helpful when I called yesterday about the gasket specs confusion. Managed to sort out which material grade we need. Appreciate the patience explaining the difference.

Your driver reached site 30 minutes early yesterday which is good, but he never call our foreman first so nobody there to receive. Next time please coordinate properly so we don't waste time waiting around.

Your guy Tommy really helped us out when we realized the gasket material wasn't compatible with our chemical process. He suggested the right grade same day and we avoided a costly delay. Appreciate the technical knowledge your team has.

The gaskets you supplied last month are performing well in the high-pressure application, no issues so far. But I noticed your recent quote is about 15% higher than before, can check if there's room to negotiate on pricing for our next bulk order?

The valves arrived on time but two of them had damaged actuators, probably from transport. Your team quickly arranged replacement units within 24 hours so minimal impact to our schedule. Appreciate the fast response but maybe need better packaging next time.

The gaskets you supplied last month are performing well but we noticed the packaging was damaged on arrival. Not a major issue since the products inside were fine, but please use stronger boxes for future shipments especially for fragile items.

Your team very responsive when we have questions, appreciate that. But the last delivery came one day late and nobody informed us until we called to follow up. Can improve on the communication side when got delays.

Your technician came down yesterday to check the actuator problem, quite fast response time and managed to solve on the spot. But honestly the valve itself shouldn't have this kind of issue after only 6 months of operation, maybe need to look into the quality control ah.

The welding on the gate valve bodies looks quite rough lah, got some spatter marks also. But your technical team very helpful, they came down same day to check and agree to rework. Appreciate the fast response even though the quality should have been better from start.

The invoice amount doesn't match our quotation, got extra charges for material handling that was not discussed before. Please revise and send updated invoice by tomorrow latest because our accounts closing this month.

The bolts supplied with the butterfly valve set are too short, cannot tighten properly to the flange. Need longer bolts urgently as installation already delayed 2 days. Please send replacement by tomorrow latest.

The flanges arrived on time but the coating quality not up to standard lah. Got some rust spots already and we haven't even install yet. Can your QC check properly before shipping next time? Otherwise the material itself is correct spec.

Your technician came down yesterday to help troubleshoot the pressure issue, very knowledgeable guy and sorted it out in 20 minutes. But the service call invoice charging 2 hours minimum seems excessive for such quick job. Can you review the billing?
Your team very responsive this time, appreciate that. But the packaging still not strong enough, two boxes arrive damaged. Can improve or not?

The gasket material you supplied is not matching what we ordered according to our material cert, we specified Viton but this looks like standard NBR. Can you check the delivery note and material test certificate again because we cannot install wrong material in our chemical plant.

The threaded connections on batch 7 don't match what we ordered, our fitter noticed they're NPT instead of BSP. Can you verify against the PO and let us know if we need to send them back or if you can swap them out quickly?

The delivery truck reached our Punggol worksite around 11am instead of the scheduled 8am slot, caused some delay to our installation team. But your driver very helpful, he help us offload and arrange the covers properly so overall still acceptable lah.

The valve actuator arrived on time but the mounting bracket holes don't line up with our existing setup, looks like maybe wrong revision. Can you check the drawing we sent in March and confirm which version you fabricated? Need to resolve fast because installation team is on site this week.

Your team came down yesterday to fix the leaking gasket issue very fast, appreciate that, but I noticed the replacement bolts look different grade from original specification. Can you confirm material cert matches our approved submittal?

Your team very helpful during the urgent breakdown last week, really appreciate the quick response. But the replacement gasket you sent is slightly different material from original spec, can you confirm if it's compatible or need to reorder?

The flange facing on batch PO-8834 got some machining marks that quite deep, our QA worried about sealing performance. Can send your technician down to inspect together with us tomorrow morning or not? Really appreciate if can resolve fast because installation already scheduled for Friday.

The coating you applied last month already showing rust spots at three locations. Site engineer took photos and sending to you separately. This never happen with the previous batches we received, something different with your process or not?

The gasket material you supplied last week is different thickness from what we ordered, our supervisor measured 4.5mm but PO clearly states 3mm. This causing issue during installation because the bolt length not enough now. Please check your records and send correct spec urgently.

The gaskets arrived on time but when our technician open the package he noticed the material spec different from what we ordered. We need EPDM grade but this one looks like standard rubber only. Can you verify the material cert and resend if wrong?

The gasket material you sent this time looks different color from previous batch. Same part number on the label but texture also not same. Can you confirm is correct grade or not? Our maintenance team worried to use for high pressure line.

Your sales team confirm can deliver the gate valves by 15th but warehouse say stock only coming 22nd. Which one is correct? We need to know now because our contractor already schedule the installation crew.

The ball valves arrived on time but packaging was damaged on two boxes. Valves inside seem okay but can you check with your warehouse why the outer cartons so weak? Also still waiting for the test certificates you promised last week.

The gaskets we received yesterday different thickness from last shipment even though same part number. Production line already stop because cannot fit properly. Can send your QC person down to verify or not?

The gaskets you delivered yesterday are correct size but material spec shows EPDM when we clearly requested Viton for chemical compatibility. Our purchase order also states Viton so not sure how this mix up happened. Can you rush replace by Thursday morning before we start the pump installation?

The flanges we received last batch all passed inspection no problem, but this time the mill certs showing different material grade from what we ordered. Can you verify with factory and resend correct documentation? Our QA won't approve until paperwork matches exactly.
Your team respond very fast to our urgent request last week, but the material cert still pending until now. Can expedite? Our client chasing us for the documentation already.

Your team respond very fast to our urgent RFQ for the gate valves but the technical datasheet missing some info about pressure rating at elevated temperature. Can send the full spec sheet so we can finalize the PO by this week?

The gearbox housing we received last Friday has some surface rust already, quite surprising since it's supposed to be marine grade material. Can you check with your QC team what happened during storage or was there a material mix-up? We've worked together for 3 years without this kind of issue.

The stainless steel flanges arrived yesterday but three pieces have surface scratches quite deep already. Not sure if happened during transport or before packing. Can you check with your QC team and arrange replacement because our client very particular about cosmetic condition for this pharmaceutical project.

Your team very responsive this time, settle my urgent request within 2 hours. But I noticed the gasket material different from what we usually order, hope no issue with the high temperature application we mentioned before.

Your technician came down to site yesterday but turns out he brought the wrong torque wrench spec, so cannot complete the flange tightening work. Now need reschedule which means our pressure test also push back. Please coordinate better with your team before sending people down.

The pipe fittings arrived on time but we found 3 pieces with minor surface scratches during inspection. Not a major issue since they're for non-critical areas, but would appreciate if your team can pack more carefully next time. Overall still happy with the responsive service from your sales team.

The valve actuators arrived on time but the mounting brackets are missing from the package. Can you check what happened and send them over by tomorrow? We have the installation crew scheduled already.

The RFQ you sent back has pricing for items we didn't even ask for, and missing two critical line items from our original request. Can you revise and resubmit by tomorrow morning? Also your sales guy hasn't been responding to emails for three days already.

The threaded fittings we collected last Tuesday don't match the specs in your quotation - all 1.5 inch instead of 2 inch size. Our QS already measured and confirmed the discrepancy. Please arrange replacement urgently as our plumber cannot proceed with the Ang Mo Kio installation.

Your technician came down yesterday to check the pressure regulator issue, very professional and fast response. But honestly the part should not have failed so quickly, only 6 months since installation leh.

The welding rods arrived yesterday but quantity short by 2 boxes. Your delivery guy say he will come back with balance but until now still haven't show up. Please coordinate with logistics and confirm timing because our welders are standing by.

The threaded fittings arrived on time and packaging was good, but when our fitter tried to assemble, found that 15 out of 80 pieces have thread damage. Can you arrange replacement urgently? Project supposed to start Thursday morning already.

Your team responded very fast to our RFI about the valve specifications, appreciate that. But the revised drawing still showing old revision number, can you reissue with correct marking? Our consultant very particular about document control one.

Your team very helpful lah, the technical support guy called me back within 30 minutes to confirm the gasket specs. But the invoice still showing old pricing, I thought you already gave me the revised rates last week?

Your driver delivered to wrong block yesterday, we had to arrange our own forklift to shift the material across. Quite troublesome but at least the items arrived same day. Please brief your logistics team to call our site supervisor before delivery next time.

Your technical team took three days to respond to our urgent query about the valve specifications, but when they did reply the information was very detailed and helpful. Maybe can improve response time for future urgent matters?

Your team deliver the valves two days early, really appreciate that. But can check why the test certificates all showing different inspector name from what we discussed? Our QA department quite particular about this one.

Your QC team very helpful, they stayed back after hours to help verify the valve specs with our consultant. But the delivery still came one day late which affected our installation schedule. Can you improve coordination between QC and logistics next time?

Your technician came yesterday to help us troubleshoot the valve installation issue. Very patient and professional, managed to sort it out in 2 hours. Appreciate the quick response after we called Monday morning.

The galvanized pipes arrived on time but three pieces had damaged threading that we only noticed during installation. Can you arrange replacement by Thursday and also check the QC process because this is affecting our site progress.

The flanges arrived on time but noticed the coating thickness not matching what we discussed during site visit. Can you send me the inspection report so I can verify before installation? Customer is asking questions and I need to give them proper documentation.

Your team very helpful lah, the technical guy came down to site same day to help us solve the flange alignment issue. But the delivery driver never call before coming, lucky got people at gate to receive, if not wasted trip.

Your team very responsive when we call about the urgent spares, but the invoice pricing different from what your sales guy quoted last month. Can check and send us revised invoice? Otherwise payment will be delayed on our side.

The flange gaskets arrived on time but when we open the box got water damage on some of them. Not sure if can still use or need replacement. Please advise quickly because installation scheduled for this Thursday.

The quality inspector passed everything but your driver unloaded at the wrong block, wasted half day coordinating with security to move the materials. Next time confirm the exact location with our site supervisor first before dispatch.

The valves arrived on time but packaging was bit damaged on one box, luckily product inside still ok. Maybe can improve the outer carton quality for next shipment to avoid potential issues during transport.

The threaded fittings arrived on time but two pieces have damaged threads that cannot engage properly. Can you arrange replacement urgently as our installation team is already mobilized on site. Otherwise quality is acceptable for the rest of the batch.

Your technician came down to site yesterday very professional and help us troubleshoot the valve issue on the spot. But the replacement gasket still haven't arrive yet, already 5 days past the promised delivery date. Can expedite or not? Our client chasing us very tight already.

The gaskets you supplied last month are performing really well in high pressure applications, no leaks at all. However I noticed your invoice pricing was different from the quote you gave us earlier, can you check and adjust?

The emergency spill kit you sent over yesterday is missing the absorbent pads inside, only got the gloves and goggles. Our EHS audit is this Thursday so really need the complete set urgently. Can you arrange replacement by Wednesday latest?

Your technical team helped us solve the valve sizing issue within two hours, really appreciate the quick response. However the delivery came one day late which affected our installation schedule slightly. Overall still satisfied with the support level.

The grating we received is correct size but the galvanizing thickness looks uneven, some areas shinier than others. Our consultant worried it won't meet the spec requirements. Can you send someone down tomorrow to inspect before we install?

Your technician Alex did a good job during the installation at Tuas yesterday but he left some packaging materials behind. Can you send someone to clear it? Also the invoice amount doesn't match the revised quotation you sent last week, please check and resend.
Your team very helpful during installation last week but the gaskets you send not matching with the pipe size we ordered. Can rush replacement set by Friday? Our project cannot delay further.

Your technician came down yesterday for the pump alignment but forgot to bring the laser tool. Wasted half day waiting, now need to reschedule again which affects our maintenance window. Please coordinate properly before sending people down.

The flange gaskets arrived on time but packaging was damaged, luckily the items inside still okay. Just want to highlight in case this is recurring issue with your courier. Otherwise quality is good as usual.

Just want to highlight that your delivery driver went the extra mile yesterday, helped us unload even though it wasn't in the scope. Really appreciate that kind of service especially during our tight installation window.

The payment terms in your revised proposal are better but we still need to discuss the warranty period. Our client is insisting on 24 months instead of the standard 12 months you offered. Can your sales manager call me to work this out?
The gasket material spec in your quotation different from what we discussed on phone last week. Can you clarify which one you actually supplying? Need to confirm before we proceed with PO.

Your driver reached our Woodlands site at 11am but guard never let him in because the delivery order missing the project code. We already told your sales team last week must have all the codes properly filled in. Now the materials stuck at guardhouse and our contractor waiting since morning.

The gasket material you sent is different from what we discussed during the site visit last week. Our engineer checked and say this one not suitable for high temperature application. Can you confirm if there was mix up in the order or we need to reorder the correct spec?

Your technician came on site last Friday but the flanges he brought were Class 150 rating, we specifically ordered Class 300 for high pressure steam line. Now our piping work delayed by one week already, please arrange urgent replacement and confirm compatibility with ASME standards.

The gaskets arrived yesterday but wrong specification lah, we ordered EPDM but you all send NBR rubber. Now project delayed because need to reorder. Please expedite the correct material, site supervisor already complaining.

The technician who came down yesterday very helpful and professional, explain clearly what cause the valve leakage. But the replacement part still not arrive yet, already one week liao. Can expedite or not?

Your team really helped us out when we had that urgent leak at the Tuas plant last week, managed to get the replacement gaskets same day. Only issue is the invoice came with wrong pricing, still waiting for revised one after I highlighted three days ago.
Your technician came down yesterday to check the leaking valve but he say need to order spare parts first. Can you give me timeline when can complete the repair? Our production line affected already.

Your team helped us solve the flange gasket issue very fast last week, really appreciate the quick response. But this week when we ordered the same item again, nobody confirmed the delivery date even after 3 days already. Can your sales coordinator follow up more consistently or not?

The delivery came on time which is good, but honestly the packaging quite poor lah. Two of the fittings had surface scratches, not serious but still need to explain to my boss. Hope next time can bubble wrap properly, especially for the polished items.

The gaskets arrived on time but when we opened the boxes half of them were the wrong material spec. Can you arrange collection and rush the correct EPDM ones by Thursday? Our installation team is standing by.
Your technician came yesterday to check the pressure gauge issue but he say need to order spare part from supplier. How long will take? My boss keep asking me when can resume operation.
Your team respond very fast to our queries, appreciate that, but the last invoice got some discrepancy with the agreed pricing. Can you check and send revised one by tomorrow morning?

The mild steel plates arrived yesterday but the mill cert number doesn't match what's written on our delivery order. Can you confirm if this is the correct batch? Our welding already scheduled for tomorrow morning so need answer fast.

Your team very fast respond to our urgent request for the replacement gaskets. Quality also good, no issue during installation. But delivery guy never call before coming, our store closed already he waited outside one hour.

The gaskets you sent last week don't match the flange size we ordered, looks like someone mixed up the specs. Can you arrange replacement urgently? Our installation team is on standby and we're burning daylight here.

The galvanized coating look a bit uneven on some sections lah, not sure if within tolerance or not. Can your QC person come down and verify before we install? Don't want to remove everything later if inspector reject during final inspection.

The galvanized steel brackets arrived on schedule but some pieces have uneven coating thickness especially at the corners. Our QA team flagged 15 out of 80 pieces. Can you arrange replacement or should we return the whole batch?

Your driver delivered to the wrong block yesterday, wasted 2 hours of our time coordinating. After that also nobody from your office called to apologize or follow up. Please train your logistics team better.
The ball valves arrived on time but three pieces missing the handle assembly. Can send the replacement parts by tomorrow morning? Our contractor cannot install without the handles.

The valves arrived on time but three of them have scratches on the body, not deep but visible enough that our QC might reject them. Can you check with your warehouse what happened during packing? Also still waiting for your reply on the pressure test certificates I requested two days back.
Your team very responsive on WhatsApp but the invoice pricing different from quotation. Can check and revert? We need to close PO by Friday latest.

The payment terms in your revised quote changed from 30 days to COD without any discussion. This is different from what we agreed during the meeting last month. Please explain why the terms changed or revert back to original 30 days credit.
The gaskets arrived this morning but three pieces have wrong thickness according to the packing list. Can you check your QC records and send replacement by end of week? Rest of the order is fine.

The flange dimensions you sent don't match what we discussed during site visit. Can someone come down to verify the measurements again? Project timeline very tight already cannot afford to order wrong size.

The gasket material you sent doesn't match what we discussed during the site meeting last week, spec sheet shows different temperature rating. Can you confirm if this is correct grade or there was a mix up at your dispatch? Need to resolve fast because installation scheduled for this Friday morning.

The technician who came for installation was professional and finished ahead of schedule, but we're still missing the O&M manual that should have been provided. Can you please send the documentation by end of this week as our facility manager needs it for compliance records.

The gaskets arrived on time but when our technician opened the box yesterday he found 5 pieces damaged already, looks like transport issue. Can you check with your logistics team and send replacement by this Friday? We have shutdown maintenance scheduled next week cannot delay.

The gaskets you supplied last month are performing very well in our cooling system, no leaks at all. But this month same spec order came with different packaging and the material cert is missing. Can you explain why got difference and send us the proper documentation?

The flange bolts arrived yesterday but 3 pieces are missing from the package. We need complete set urgently as installation scheduled tomorrow morning. Can you arrange immediate delivery for the shortage?

Your technician who came down yesterday very helpful and professional. Explained everything clearly about the installation procedure. Only issue is he mention we need additional brackets but nobody informed us earlier, so now have to rush order.

Your delivery driver very helpful last Tuesday, helped our site supervisor unload the heavy gate valves even though not his job scope. But the packing list missing two items description, caused some confusion during our internal QC check.

The gaskets you delivered yesterday are correct spec but quantity short by 15 pieces according to our store count. Invoice shows full quantity 100pcs so not sure if packing mistake or what. Please verify and send balance urgently as our installation schedule cannot delay.
Your team delivered the valves two days late and didn't inform us about the delay. Communication needs improvement but at least the product quality was acceptable when it finally arrived.

The gaskets you supplied for our chiller installation are leaking already after just 2 weeks, very disappointed with the quality this time. Previous orders were always reliable so not sure what happened here. Please send your technician to check and provide replacement FOC.

The technical drawing you sent shows M16 bolts but the actual flanges delivered have M20 holes. Can you confirm which specification is correct because now we need to reorder all the bolts. Our installation schedule already delayed 3 days waiting for clarification.

The gasket material you supplied last week cannot tahan the high temperature at our client's site, already got leakage after 2 days operation. This one very urgent because production line stopped, need you send replacement immediately with proper heat resistance spec and also explain what went wrong with the first batch.

Your Daniel very helpful during the Sembawang project last week, managed to coordinate the urgent delivery even though was short notice. But the galvanised coating on some of the pipe fittings not consistent, some parts thicker than others. Can send replacement for the affected pieces?

The bolts we ordered arrived on time but some of the threading looks rough, our fitter had trouble screwing them in smoothly. Can you check your QC process? Otherwise your pricing is competitive and we'd like to continue working together.

Your team delivered the valves on time but the invoice pricing doesn't match the revised quotation you sent last month. Can you recheck and send updated invoice? Also still waiting for the test certificates you promised to email by Friday.

Your delivery driver very helpful this time, even help us unload the heavy flanges. But the packing list missing two items, took us extra time to verify everything. Can you make sure your warehouse double check before sending out next time?

The galvanized coating thickness report you sent shows 85 microns but our site measurement only getting 65-70 microns. Need your QC engineer come down verify before we can sign off the DO. This holding up our installation schedule already.

The welder you sent over last Thursday very experienced, finished the job ahead of schedule. But your coordinator never update me about the change in timing, I was still waiting at the old location wasting my morning.
Just checked the gaskets you sent for the Jurong project, thickness is spot on and material cert matches perfectly. Good job on the QC this time round.

Your team responded quite fast on the technical query about the pressure rating, appreciate that. However the delivery still delayed by 3 days from what was promised last week, causing some issues with our site schedule.

Your team delivered the materials two days ahead of schedule which helped us avoid delay penalties, but the invoice has wrong quantity listed - shows 120 units when PO clearly states 100 units. Can you issue revised invoice by tomorrow?

Your delivery last Friday afternoon was 3 days late, caused our installation team to standby and waste time. But must say the quality of the butterfly valves all okay lah, no defects found during inspection.

The technician came yesterday to check the pump but he say the model number on our site is different from what we ordered in the system. Can you verify which one is correct? We cannot proceed with the maintenance until this is sorted out.

Your technician came down to site on Tuesday but the shipment only arrived Thursday, so he made wasted trip. Can coordinate better next time? But anyway the installation support was quite good once everything reached.

The flange gaskets we ordered came in wrong material specification - we need spiral wound with graphite filler but received compressed fiber instead. Your sales guy confirmed the correct spec on the call last Tuesday. Can arrange replacement by Friday morning or our installation schedule will be pushed back?
Just received the gaskets but the packaging was damaged during transport. Material inside seems okay but need your QC to verify before we can install. Can you send someone down tomorrow morning?

Your quotation came in higher than expected but after discussing with my boss we understand the material grade upgrade is necessary for offshore application. Can you confirm lead time is still 6 weeks and include the mill certificates in delivery?

The actuator mounting bracket came bent, looks like damage during transport. Can you send replacement part only instead of whole unit? We need it urgently because installation already scheduled for next Monday morning.

The galvanized coating on this batch looks uneven, got some patches where the zinc layer quite thin. Last three shipments were all consistent quality, so wondering what changed in your process? Our QC team worried this might affect corrosion resistance for outdoor installation.

The invoice charging got problem lah, say we order 20 pieces but PO clearly state 15 pieces only. Can your accounts team recheck and send revised invoice? Our finance very strict one, cannot process wrong amount.

The valve actuators arrived on time but the mounting brackets don't match the ones we ordered last month, even though we used the same PO template. Our technician cannot install now because the bolt pattern is different. Can you check if factory changed the design or got mixed up with another order?

The galvanized coating report shows 80 microns but our spec clearly states minimum 100 microns. Already installed half the batch before we caught this during random check. Can you verify the test results and advise how to proceed with the remaining material?

Your delivery driver very helpful, he called 30 mins before reaching site and helped to unload everything properly. But the packing list missing two items that were supposed to be in this shipment, can you verify with warehouse and send the balance next week?

The technician who came for commissioning very helpful and patient, explained everything clearly to our maintenance team. But the instruction manual provided was for different model, caused some confusion initially until we clarified with your office.

Your Angie very helpful during the urgent Tuas project last week, she stayed back to arrange the emergency delivery. But this week different person handle my enquiry, response very slow, took two days just to get a quotation for standard items.

The gasket material you delivered works fine but the packing list missing the batch number so our incoming inspection cannot complete the traceability documentation. Can you email us the correct batch number by tomorrow? Our production line waiting already.
The gaskets arrived on time but packaging was damaged on one pallet, luckily the products inside still okay. Maybe can improve the wrapping next time especially for sea freight shipments.

Your team very helpful lah, the technical guy came down to site and help me solve the alignment problem with the check valves. But delivery was supposed to be Thursday, came Friday instead, lucky never affect my schedule too much.

Your team very responsive this time, appreciate the quick turnaround on the revised quote. But can help check why the valve specs different from what we discussed last week? Drawing shows PN16 but quote is for PN10.

The gaskets you delivered yesterday are different thickness from the sample we approved last month. Our engineer measured 4.5mm but should be 3mm according to the spec sheet. Please check if wrong item was sent or did you change the supplier?

Your team very helpful lah, the engineer came down personally to check the flange alignment issue and settled it on the spot. But I noticed the invoice got charge for site visit when your sales person told me first visit is FOC. Can revert back the original quotation price or not?

The threaded connections on batch PO-8823 don't seem to match our previous order specs. Workshop team tried to fit them yesterday but the torque values are way off from what we normally use. Can you send someone down to verify or at least confirm if there's been any supplier change on your end?

The galvanized grating we received yesterday got some rust stains already, quite strange for new material. Can your QC team advise if this is normal or we should reject the batch? Our consultant might raise issue during handover inspection next week.

The pressure gauge we ordered arrived with cracked glass cover, cannot use lah. Need replacement urgently because our client inspection is this Thursday morning. Also the calibration cert inside showing different model number from what we ordered, please double check.

The gate valves arrived on schedule but three units had damaged handwheels, likely from poor packing. Can you arrange replacement parts or should we return the whole batch? Need to resolve quickly as installation is planned for next Monday.

The gaskets you supplied last month are leaking already, very poor quality compared to previous batch. Can you check what happened with the material specification? We need replacement set by next Tuesday otherwise have to source from another supplier.

The technician who came down yesterday very helpful and patient, stayed back extra time to train our operators on the maintenance procedure. But honestly the spare parts kit you supplied is missing the O-rings, can you send over by this Friday because we got planned shutdown next week.

The technician who came yesterday was very helpful and patient explaining how to maintain the equipment properly, but honestly the spare parts pricing is quite high compared to other suppliers. Can you check if got any possibility to reduce a bit especially since we are ordering in bulk quantity?

The stainless steel pipes arrived on time but three pieces had scratches on the surface. Not sure if happened during transport or before packing. Can your QC check more carefully next time, otherwise overall service quite good lah.

The welding on the steel grating we received last week is not consistent, some spots look very rough. Our site supervisor concerned it won't pass inspection. Can you send someone to check before we install everything?

The gasket material you supplied this time different from last batch even though same part number. Can you confirm if there was a spec change or is this supplier variation? Need to know before we install because client very strict on material traceability.

Your driver delivered the MS plates to wrong location yesterday, we specified Jurong Island Gate 3 but he went to Gate 5. Caused 2 hours delay for our installation team. Please brief your logistics properly on site access requirements.

The galvanized coating on the batch we received looks uneven in some areas, thickness gauge reading varies quite a bit. Can you confirm if this still meets the standard specification or should we reject? Need quick answer because installation scheduled for next week already.

Your technician came yesterday but he say need different size O-ring, so cannot complete the job. Why never check specification before sending people down? Now have to reschedule again and our line still down.

Your technician came yesterday to fix the leaking valve but today same problem happen again. Maybe the replacement part not suitable or installation got issue? Can send someone to check properly this time.

The bolts you sent last month are starting to show rust marks already, only been installed for 3 weeks. Our site is indoor somemore, not even exposed to weather. Can you check if correct grade was supplied or not?
Your sales team very responsive but delivery keep pushing back. Already 3 weeks delay from original schedule, our site supervisor keep chasing me. Need firm commitment date not estimate only.

The gaskets you supplied are correct size but material grade doesn't match what we specified in the RFQ, we need EPDM not NBR for this application. Can you confirm if replacement batch can reach us by Friday, our installation crew already scheduled for weekend work.

Your site supervisor confirm 20 pieces ready for collection yesterday but when our lorry reach your yard this morning only 12 pieces available. This delay affect our installation schedule for Jurong project already. Please coordinate better between your production and dispatch team.

The gaskets we ordered last week finally arrived but some pieces got damaged during transport, packaging was not strong enough. Can you send replacements by Thursday morning because our contractor is already on site and waiting to install.

The gasket material you supplied this time is different thickness compared to last batch even though same part number. My technician cannot install properly because the bolt length not suitable. Can you check your stock and confirm the specification is correct or not?

Your team really helped us out with the rush order last week, arrived exactly on time. But I noticed the test certificates were missing the heat numbers for two batches. Can send over the complete documentation? Client asking for it.

Just received the ball valves for Tuas project but noticed the actuator mounting holes not aligned properly. Our technician try to install already waste one hour still cannot fit. Can send your people down to check or not? Otherwise we delay handover to client.

The gaskets you sent don't match the specs we discussed last week during the site visit. Our engineer checked and the thickness is 3mm instead of 5mm. Can you rush send the correct ones by tomorrow morning? We have installation scheduled already.

The stainless steel flanges arrived on time but the packaging was damaged on two boxes. Inside condition looks okay but can you confirm with your logistics team what happened during transport? We need better protection for next shipment especially for the larger diameter ones.

Your team very helpful when we had the urgent valve issue on Saturday. Managed to source the replacement by Monday morning. Only thing is the invoice pricing slightly different from what sales quoted, can you check and revert?

Your delivery team left the materials outside the gate even though our security called them twice. Last time they always wait for our store keeper to open up. Not sure what happened this round but please brief your drivers properly.

The surface finish on the flanges looks good but can you confirm if the heat treatment cert is following the latest ASME specs? Our client's consultant raised some questions during their inspection yesterday and we need to respond by tomorrow.

The gaskets arrived on time but wrong material grade, your sales person confirmed EPDM but we received NBR instead. This is second time material mix-up happened, please improve your warehouse checking process before dispatch.

Your technician came yesterday to check the valve alignment issue and solved it in less than one hour, very professional. But honestly the response time was quite slow lah, we called on Monday and he only came Thursday afternoon. Maybe can improve the scheduling next time?
Your team very responsive lah, but the welding rods quality inconsistent between batches. First delivery perfect, second batch got some defects our QC reject. Can you standardize or not?

The stainless steel flanges arrived on time but two pieces had minor surface scratches that might affect the clean room installation. Can you check with your warehouse if they have replacement stock or should we proceed with these since the project timeline is very tight already?
Just want to say your team response time very good this round. Quote came back same day and technical clarification also very fast. Hope can maintain this level for future orders.

The gasket material you sent doesn't match the specification in our PO. We ordered graphite but received compressed fiber instead. Please arrange replacement urgently as our installation is scheduled for this Friday.

Your team very helpful during the site visit last week, appreciate the technical advice given. However the delivery promised for Wednesday still not arrive until Friday evening which cause some delay to our installation schedule. Overall satisfied with product quality but hope can improve on the delivery timing next time.
